评论详情: I bought this Stanford shirt for my 14 year old to wear for his "College Day"  at his high school. It is a high quality tee, great graphic, but unfortunately the sleeves oddly seemed to be super short compared to standard length tees (from the shoulder seam to the hemmed sleeve on the outside, only measured about 4.5"). I almost thought I bought a kid's tee, but I double checked my order, and it was an adult small. The length of the body is perfect, I think the sleeves were defective. The other college tees he has the sleeves measured 6". I am sad he will not be wearing this shirt. :(
